resources.string: If an update is found, it will be shown in the list. Select the wanted updater and pull the drawer on the bottom of the screen to see the changelog and install or download the update.

These patches allow you to add some new functionalities to the ROM. If you use these patches, it\'s possible that you won\'t be able to use incremental updates. Moreover, these patches need to be installed after every new ROM install.
If no options are shown, you don\'t have any installable zips on the updates folder, download some file or change the updates folder in \'Settings\'.
Bei start der Anwenndung nach neuen Updates suchen
Prüfen der MD5 wird dringend empfohlen um defekte Dateien zu vermeiden.
Das Gerät möchte ins Recovery starten. Zulassen?
The integrity of the file could not be checked because the MD5SUM file is missing.\nDo you want to try to install it anyway?
There is not network connection, please verify if WiFi or Mobile Networks are enabled.
Connection problem or bad JSON file.
JSON file could not be found, the application cannot check for updates
The downloaded file is corrupt, manually delete it and download it again.
